titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation declaring the letters of mart formerly granted to George Carew Esq., to be recalled
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our castle at Windsor the 26th day of August 1680, in the two and thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
